item.title: Lock this or else
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:22, topic:25688”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=38574.msg465374#msg465374 date=1163648566]

Excuse me, this hardly seems to a sympathy thread. Why would he ask for sympathy about being unbanned? He’s mocking Jagex at a mistake the happened to make. Not going “omfg, i gt banned free accnt plese?”.

I found it rather amusing actually. You would normally get a personal response from telling Andrew to go suck a dick.

No offence but you may want to reread my post. I was just saying that lately there has been many “banned” threads. I simply meant that for a little while everyone was making sympathy threads, and then everyone started making leaving threads, and now everyone is making “I got banned” threads. And another thing, to find this amusing you’d have to have quite an immature humour, no offence again.
[/quote]

  1. This isn’t an “0mg, i g0t band fread”. He’s mocking JaGeX because they unbanned him for saying Andrew can suck his wankey?
  2. Ok, you win. I MUST have an immature sense of humour because I found this amusing. /wrists[/quote]

Yeah except it’s fake. Therefore, he’s looking for attention.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock this or else
item.dc:creator: @j4m3s j4m3s
item.description:
@j4m3s wrote:

[quote=“Thabest, post:17, topic:25688”][quote author=Got_Shine link=topic=38574.msg465363#msg465363 date=1163648449]

they’re retarded because they actually unbanned me because of it, but when people send in sensible appeals they get slapped across the face and told to read the rules
[/quote]Its almost an automatic ban for breaking rule #7, they disregard appeals for it, and they’re probably still backed up with appeals for #7.

#1,2 however is probably different, and the offense wasn’t big enough for them to perm ban you, so instead once you sent the appeal they automatically un-banned you.


I didn’t edit it, and I really dont give two shits if you believe me or not.[/quote]

ok dude, your retarded, on the second 1 it says,

Offence type: Breaking rule 2

now on your banned thingy report,

it says that breaking rule 2 was DENIED.

it is counted as succesful is they unban your account.

and yes im screening for post so you cant change it and make me look like a retard

Read full topic
